QuestData.Title: Follow Your Nose
QuestData.Description: You there! I could use your help!$b$bThe ground isn't safe. The quilboar have established a network of tunnels below us, allowing them to spring up to ambush people who aren't walking carefully.$b$bLuckily for us, Humphrey here has a nose for the Briarback, and can sniff 'em out even when they're underground. Root a few of them out and let's make the farms a little safer to walk through.$b$bThere's a particularly large clump of them in the northeastern fields. Good hunting!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Humphrey to find and slay $1oa Panicked Tunnelers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Humphrey's a good boy, isn't he? Of course he is.
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! I bet ol' Humphrey gave them a good spook!
